bibl.title: The Oasis Papers 3. Proceedings of the Third International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project. (Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 14.)
bibl.note: 1 front. coul., tabl., fac-sim., figg., plans, pll. n./bl. et coul.

25 communications. - P. v: G.E.B. and C.A.H., Editors' Preface. - Prehistory. - Environment. - Historical Archaeology I: Pharaonic Period. - Historical Archaeology II: Ptolemaic-Roman Period at Kellis.

BOWEN Gillian E. and Colin A. HOPE (Edd.), assisted by Bruce E. PARR, The Oasis Papers 3. Proceedings of the Third International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project. (Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 14.)
Oxford, Oxbow Books, 2003, 4°, x-382 pp., 1 front. coul., tabl., fac-sim., figg., plans, pll. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 1-84217-129-1. £75.
